ygData.subject: Re: Druid flying solo, mostly.
ygData.msgSnippet: Do you recall to whom the picks are turned in? Barto ... once ... new ... then ... what ... http://docs.yahoo.com/info/terms/
ygData.messageBody:
Do you recall to whom the picks are turned in?

Barto

--- In EverQuest@y..., "Su" <suceress@s...> wrote:
>
> If you get to Freeport, turn in Orc Pawn Picks.
> luv,
> -Su
>
> > I am developing a halfling druid for mostly solo play. I group
once
> > in a while, but prefer to develop solo skills. I am a relatively
new
> > player, so I am not sure just where I am going.
> >
> > My current goal is attaining level 14, to gain SOW and bind. I
then
> > plan to begin traveling and picking up some of the little quests.
> >
> > I am drawn initially toward the Commons. Any suggestions as to
what
> > interesting low-level solo quests might be in that area?
> >
> > Barto of Rivervale.
> >
> >
> > Visit the EverQuest homepage at http://www.everquest.com
